function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for airborne transmission of COVID-19 due to inadequate purging and ventilation in enclosed spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among occupants of the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing regular purging and cleaning of enclosed spaces, reducing occupancy, and introducing unoccupied periods with increased ventilation.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters, ventilation control systems.","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces, especially in classrooms, meeting rooms, and conference rooms.","Owner":"Building managers, facility managers, and employers."},{"Description":"Disturbance of air and dispersal of airborne aerosols due to movement of people within enclosed spaces.","Impact":"Increased dispersal of airborne aerosols, potentially leading to higher risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing regular purging and cleaning of enclosed spaces, and reducing occupancy to minimize air disturbance.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters, ventilation control systems.","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces, especially in classrooms, meeting rooms, and conference rooms.","Owner":"Building managers, facility managers, and employers."}]}
